name: Platform Golf
summary:
Platform Golf is a 2D physics based arcady golf game. 
It features a variety of levels with unique designs. 
 
Life is like Platform Golf... 
 
Sometimes you have to try a few times to reach your goal 
Sometimes you take a breath to make a long shot 
Sometimes time is of the essence and you have to make haste! 
And sometimes you take a big leap of faith 
Often the use of tactics can be helpful to get out of a tricky situation 
Letting yourself fall can also be of use 
And at some point you may take a step back for this one perfect shot 
So you will break through in the end 
How all these come together you can find out through the gameplay 
So don’t hesitate and start playing one of many challenging Levels!
